means: （使）变硬( harden的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: All of a sudden my heart hardened against her.
sentence.Network_cn: 突然间我对她硬起了心肠。

sentence.Network_en: His smile died and the look in his face hardened.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的笑容消失了，脸上的表情严肃了起来。

sentence.Network_en: She was hardened by the rigours of the Siberian steppes.
sentence.Network_cn: 西伯利亚大草原的艰苦环境使她变得坚强起来。

entry.tran: 硬心肠的;冷酷无情的;麻木不仁的
entry.def: If you describe someone as hardened, you mean that they have had so much experience of something bad or unpleasant that they are no longer affected by it in the way that other people would be.

means.word_mean: 2. made hard or flexible or resilient especially by heat treatment;

sentences.sentence: "a peasant, dark, lean-faced, wind-inured"- Robert Lynd
"our successors...may be graver, more inured and equable men"- V.S.Pritchett

auth_sentence.content: By last night the Government's line had hardened.
auth_sentence.res_content: By last night the Government's line had hardened.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: By last night the Government's line had hardened.

auth_sentence.content: His lifelong contact with tough men had hardened him.
auth_sentence.res_content: His lifelong contact with tough men had hardened him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His lifelong contact with tough men had hardened him.

auth_sentence.content: Chill in the fridge until the mixture has hardened.
auth_sentence.res_content: Chill in the fridge until the mixture has hardened.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Chill in the fridge until the mixture has hardened.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表形容词,通常在动词后,"有……的,被……的"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通常的,习惯的,按照风俗习惯的
stems_affixes.word_buile: accustom使习惯+ed有……的,被……的→通常的,习惯的
ally同盟者+ed有……的,被……的→allied联合的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 耕耘的,有教养的,栽植的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cultivate耕耘,栽植+ed有……的,被……的→cultivated耕耘的
harden变硬+ed有……的,被……的→adj.变硬的,坚毅的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 受伤的,受损害的,受委屈的
感兴趣的,有成见的,有权益的
stems_affixes.word_buile: interest兴趣,关心+ed有……的,被……的→adj.感兴趣的,有成见的,有权益的
limit限制+ed有……的,被……的→adj.有限的,被限制的
note注意到+ed有……的,被……的→被注意的→著名的
pack打包+ed有……的,被……的→adj.充满……的,塞满了……的
repeat重复,反复+ed有……的,被……的→adj.重复的,再三的
suppose猜想,推测+ed有……的,被……的→adj.假定的,假像的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 坏的,邪恶的,缺德的,不道德的
stems_affixes.word_buile: wick+ed有……的,被……的→adj.坏的,邪恶的,缺德的,不道德的
fix固定+ed有……的,被……的→adj.固定的,确定的

Sentence.sentence: Store employees looked at me like I'm some kind of hardened criminal.
